translation:
The government again reiterates to Your Excellency, dated the 22nd of the past month, which was addressed in a circular of the same date, and recommends that you order very positively to the police commanders of your department that they never allow any individual, whatever he may be, to transit therein without being equipped with the competent passport, under the most severe responsibility, which Your Excellency 

God preserve Your Excellency
